1.0.name: wordpress/modern-multipurpose
1.0.description: Modern Multipurpose theme is free responsive HTML5 and CSS3 theme for blog with modern universal colors, menu and detail oriented design. Light and optimized code. SEO friendly structure. Widgetized sidebar and footer. 5 widgetized areas. Easy to run and modify.
